name: Battle Simulator Game:Ragdoll
description: This game has many maps(eagle base,eng rafts,eng glacier,eng desert hill,archipelago,canyon,dustbowl,coastline,island,temple,river,mountains,eng twin islands,eng tunnel,vehicle testing ) It is specially recommended that you play island, twin islands map,There are 20 kinds of guns and 8 kinds of vehicles waiting for you to experience.
